entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:15 a.m. EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.8Â°C

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:38 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind south 30 km/h. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 7:38 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
